wikipedia_page.main: Clifford Arthur Kinvig (22 November 1934 – 22 February 2017) was senior lecturer in war studies at the Royal Military Academy, Sandhurst, director of education of the British Army, and a noted military author who debunked some of the myths about the bridge over the River Kwai and the construction of the Burma Railway.

response: * Clifford Kinvig (Cuths) – Senior Lecturer in War Studies at RMA SandhurstMajor-General Clifford Kinvig. The Times, 27 March 2017. Retrieved 28 March 2017.
*Clifford Kinvig, 82, British military historian.Major-General Clifford Kinvig
* Clifford Kinvig (1934-2017), lecturer in war studies at the Royal Military Academy, Sandhurst, from a family of Isle of Man roots.
